title: Cognitive-Based English Vocabulary Learning Program in Scientific Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and intermediate English reading proficiency
context.additional_context: A smartphone-based VR simulation program focusing on learning practical English vocabulary in science fields.

learning_goals: Can infer meanings of 500 core science vocabulary terms with over 80% accuracy in context-specific simulations
Can achieve 70% long-term vocabulary retention within three months using cognitive strategies (focused attention, prediction, modeling, automation)

Learners apply over 20 science-specific vocabulary terms acquired through VR-based project tasks with 80%+ accuracy in at least three simulated science communication scenarios (e.g., research presentations, peer review meetings).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
